text: looking for a working linux command line tool to download from rapidshare
I'm wondering if anyone knows about a working command line tool for linux to download using premium account on rapidshare.
I've seen a python solution, which does not work for me -- returns urllib2 error message

code: urlopen error unknown url type: https

text: and my knowledge of python is not yet deep enough to figure out why: might be a recent RS change or something is wrong with my settings.
Any other tools around someone may be using and could share a link?
